properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 3:36AM EST until February 18 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation and freezing rain. Additional snow
and sleet accumulations of an inch or less and ice accumulations
of a few hundredths of an inch.

* WHERE...Niagara, Orleans, Monroe, and Genesee counties.

* WHEN...Until 8 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Untreated roads will briefly become very slippery. The
hazardous conditions could impact the early portion of the
morning commute. Temperatures will rise above freezing by mid
morning with improving travel conditions.
properties.instruction:
Periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will result in slippery
roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while
driving.

Submit snow and ice reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING
